title: Socioboard Api
description: To describe a RESTful API for socioboard
teamDescription: Socioboard team has been created automatically by the application.

authorize.secret: <<Any random secret key, used in encrypting the access token>>
authorize.token_secret: <<Any token secret key, used in encrypting the access token>>

analytics.ganalytics_service_email: <<Google Service Email Id, This email should have the permission on above track id.>>

mailService.defaultMailOption: <<Give the default mail services should take place (any one from => gmail,sendgridapi)>>
